action: Scroll 'Scroll down to access signup form'
observation: I can see the Specter.AI homepage with two prominent buttons - 'Create Account' and 'Get Started'. I also notice there are form fields below (email and password inputs) that are currently out of view. I need to scroll down to access the signup form fields to complete the registration process.
reasoning: As a normal user trying to sign up, I need to access the signup form. The email and password input fields are visible in the elements list but are positioned much lower on the page (y-coordinates around 1700-1800). I should scroll down to reach these form fields.
ux_issues: Important signup form fields are not immediately visible and require scrolling

outcome.visual_observation: The scroll action removed visible UI elements including the green-highlighted 'Sign Up' button in the header and two form input fields (one green-outlined, one purple-outlined) that were present in the middle section. The page now appears mostly empty with only the header logo and a plain 'Sign Up' button remaining.
outcome.diagnosis: Scrolling caused the signup form elements to disappear entirely rather than revealing or progressing the signup flow. The form fields and interactive elements were scrolled out of view instead of being maintained or advanced to the next step.
